name: terraform-on-azure-tools
description: Run Terraform over your Linux build agent host on Azure (with best practices).
author: Marceline Abadeer - x-Commerce Labs

inputs.name: templatesFilePath
inputs.label: Templates path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path where Terraform templates are stored (this path becomes the working folder).

inputs.name: useJsonFormatBoolean
inputs.label: Use JSON format
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check if you want to output JSON format.

inputs.name: outputVariablesMultiline
inputs.label: Output variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: Terraform output variables (one per line to avoid incorrect configuration in the format 'terraformVar1' [output only] or 'terraformVar1=azureVar1' [output and setting]).

inputs.name: terraformBackendConfigurationFilePath
inputs.label: Terraform backend configuration file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path where Terraform backend configuration file is located, leave it empty if backend configuration file is already set up.

inputs.name: terraformFilePath
inputs.label: Terraform path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path where Terraform executable is located, leave it empty if using environment variable (export).

inputs.name: failOnStdErrBoolean
inputs.label: Fail on Standard Error
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check if you want to fail this task if any errors are written to the StandardError stream.
